dispose() - Method in class vista.SwingController
Way to dispose of all memory references, and clean up the Document resources

Note: If you create several SwingControllers to manipulate a single Document, and each Controller would be disposed of at a different time, while the others continue to use that same shared Document, then you should not call Document.dispose() inside of here.
